meta.title: Live Tennis API - Wimbledon 2022
meta.description: List of matches for Wimbledon 2022 with results

tournament.id: Integer - unique tournament_id for use querying other endpoints
tournament.name: String
tournament.surface: String - tournament surface type i.e Clay, Hard Indoor, Hard Outdoor, Grass

result.result_description: String - Ended=normal result, Walkover=losing player didn't contest match, Retired=losing player retired before match finished
result.home_set1: String - home player games won during set 1
result.away_set1: String - away player games won during set 1
result.home_set2: String - home player games won during set 2
result.away_set2: String - away player games won during set 2
result.home_set3: String - home player games won during set 3 - will not be set if match didn't go to 3 sets
result.away_set3: String - away player games won during set 3 - will not be set if match didn't go to 3 sets
result.home_set4: String - home player games won during set 4 - will not be set if match didn't go to 4 sets
result.away_set4: String - away player games won during set 4 - will not be set if match didn't go to 4 sets
result.home_set5: String - home player games won during set 5 - will not be set if match didn't go to 5 sets
result.away_set5: String - away player games won during set 5 - will not be set if match didn't go to 5 sets
result.home_tb1: Integer - home player tie break score set 1 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 1
result.away_tb1: Integer - away player tie break score set 1 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 1
result.home_tb2: Integer - home player tie break score set 2 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 2
result.away_tb2: Integer - away player tie break score set 2 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 2
result.home_tb3: Integer - home player tie break score set 3 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 3
result.away_tb3: Integer - away player tie break score set 3 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 3
result.home_tb4: Integer - home player tie break score set 4 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 4
result.away_tb4: Integer - away player tie break score set 4 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 4
result.home_tb5: Integer - home player tie break score set 5 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 5
result.away_tb5: Integer - away player tie break score set 5 - will not be set if there was no tie breaker in set 5
